description: Service configuration for a pantry service
title: Service configuration for a pantry

___numberPoundsFamilySize3.description: Number of pounds allowed for service for family with size of 3

___numberPoundsFamilySize2.description: Number of pounds allowed for service for family with size of 2

___isMeasuredInActualPounds.description: Flag to indicate if a service is measured in actual pounds

___numberPoundsFamilySize1.description: Number of pounds allowed for service for family with size of 1

___isHomelessRequired.description: Flag to indicate if a household must be homeless to receive service

___maxOccurrencesInMonthPerHH.description: Max occurrences of particular service per household per month

___updatedBy.description: [Output only] User to last modify the user role

___maxOccurrencesInWeekPerHH.description: Max occurrences of particular service per household per week

___pantryId.description: [Output only] Unique ID of food pantry

___createdAt.description: [Output only] Creation time of the user role

___numberPoundsFamilySizeDelta.description: Number of incremental pounds allowed for service for each family member beyond 10

___isActive.description: Flag to indicate if a service is active

___updatedAt.description: [Output only] Last modification time of the user role

___numberPoundsFamilySize9.description: Number of pounds allowed for service for family with size of 9

___numberPoundsFamilySize8.description: Number of pounds allowed for service for family with size of 8

___numberPoundsFamilySize7.description: Number of pounds allowed for service for family with size of 7

___numberPoundsFamilySize6.description: Number of pounds allowed for service for family with size of 6

___numberPoundsFamilySize5.description: Number of pounds allowed for service for family with size of 5

___createdBy.description: [Output only] Creator of the user role

___numberPoundsFamilySize4.description: Number of pounds allowed for service for family with size of 4

___minServicesInMonthPerHH.description: Minimum number of services per household per month required for eligibility for service

___numberPoundsFamilySize10.description: Number of pounds allowed for service for family with size of 10

___isCommoditiesEligibleRequired.description: Flag to indicate if a household must be commodities eligible to receive service
